messages.message: @sudeep I would love a demo how to use elastic search and see our metrics -- maybe you could show us that at next week's demo day?
as we've been asking engineers to add metrics to all our apps, it'll be good context to see how they're used
@Aaron Tami as well as he's leading the effort for metrics and audit logs

Sounds good! @Aaron Tami @shaunak have done a lot of work on creating metrics that get stored in elastic, so they will have a lot more information on this. Will coordinate with both of them to set this up :slightly_smiling_face:

sounds good, i did the presentation about the metrics a few weeks ago, but also happy to do a demo! Right now we mainly just have the API for consuming metrics.  If we can get someone to help redo some of the Metrics App to use the metrics API, then we can start using that as well!
